about_the_game:
Solar Wave is a large-scale space strategy with indirect control. The 21st millennium, the Solar Empire conquers the entire Milky Way and rushes to the nearest galaxy. It turns out that these worlds are already inhabited. But when has this stopped humanity? Become the governor of the empire and ensure the success of the invasion.

Game Features:

  • 4x space strategy - explore the stars, colonize new worlds, capture territories.
  • Indirect control of fleets - is not the business of the governor to give orders to every soldier of the empire. Each fleet has its own tasks, and they diligently try to fulfill it.

  • Advanced economic model – create production chains, provide logistics and watch your worlds and fleets grow and gain strength.
  • Epic battles in which thousands of ships converge and burn down.

  • Colorful graphics.
  • Memorable epic soundtrack – feel the uncompromising path of humanity in the distant 21st millennium.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210 3,2 GHz / AMD Athlon™ II X2 245 2,9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution: 1920:1080 or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 3,2 GHz / AMD FX™ 8320 3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution: 1920:1080 or above

short_description: A large-scale 4X strategy game with indirect control and a focus on simulating a space empire. Capture systems, develop your economy and logistics, summon hundreds of powerful fleets, and watch as they incinerate the enemies of the Solar Empire.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
